definitions: in an extremely thorough and careful way

examples.text: the court rigorously scrutinizes the settlement

shortDefinitions: in extremely thorough and careful way

definitions: in a way that is strictly applied or adhered to

examples.text: a blackout was rigorously enforced after darkness
rigorously honest documentation of confidential experiences

shortDefinitions: in way that is strictly applied or adhered to

definitions: in a harsh and demanding way

examples.text: the government was punishing traffic law violators more rigorously
